title: Fridays to be ’work from home’ days for public servants: Minister
body_lines: Public Administration, Home Affairs, Provincial Councils and Local Government Minister Dinesh Gunawardena said today that steps will be taken to declare Friday, a day to work from home for public servants.
He said the number of days that public servants have to report for duty will be reduced to four days a week accordingly.
The Minister said that he hopes to submit the proposal in this regard to the Cabinet and take a policy decision.
